card.name: Blessed Breath
card.property: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Splice onto Arcane {W} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Bushi Tenderfoot
card.property: When a creature dealt damage by Bushi Tenderfoot this turn dies, flip Bushi Tenderfoot.

alternate.name: Kenzo the Hardhearted
alternate.property: Double strike; bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)

card.name: Cage of Hands
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. {1}{W}: Return Cage of Hands to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our own actions built the prisons that now hold us. Our hands reached too far and tried to hold too much." —Dosan the Falling Leaf

card.name: Call to Glory
card.property: Untap all creatures you control. Samurai creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "General Takeno glared at us as if we were the enemy. 'The day is not over yet,' he shouted, 'and unless you have a nezumi's heart, you will stand and fight'" —Battle of Akagi River: A Survivor's Tale

card.name: Candles' Glow
card.property: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way. Splice onto Arcane {1}{W} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Cleanfall
card.property: Destroy all enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During the war, the rites of purification were still effective, but the kami, not the kitsune, chose what to cleanse.

card.name: Devoted Retainer
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep within Eiganjo Castle lay the Palace of Infinite Halls, a seemingly endless network of corridors once guarded by a seemingly endless legion of samurai.

card.name: Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Virtue is an inner light that can prevail in every soul."

card.name: Ethereal Haze
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Imagine a dove flying through smoke. Does the dove injure the smoke? Does the smoke impede the dove?" —Teachings of Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

card.name: Ghostly Prison
card.property: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Destroyed in one of the first battles of the Kami War, the town of Reito still grieved.

card.name: Harsh Deceiver
card.property: {1}: Look at the top card of your library. {2}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, untap Harsh Deceiver and it gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Hikari, Twilight Guardian
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may exile Hikari, Twilight Guardian. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Hold the Line
card.property: Blocking creatures get +7/+7 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forgive me, Master Kami, but in the interest of my people I must halt your advance."

card.name: Honden of Cleansing Fire
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 2 life for each Shrine you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the sorrow of all, its fire was turned toward those who worshipped it.

card.name: Horizon Seed
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In peaceful times, these beings escorted the honored kami to their new shrines. In the Kami War, they became the medics of an unstoppable army.

card.name: Hundred-Talon Kami
card.property: Flying Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Indomitable Will
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "None of you are yet samurai. Defend your homes with honor, die for your cause, and perhaps then you will be worthy of the word." —General Takeno

card.name: Innocence Kami
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, untap Innocence Kami.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her voice was light, her substance music.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hound sniffed the air and let slip a low growl. General Takeno looked down at the faithful Isamaru and calmed him with a touch. "Alert the men. The kami are coming."

card.name: Kabuto Moth
card.property: Flying {T}: Target creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Many great warriors died in the first days of the war, as the spirits of their weaponry turned against them with terrifying rage." —Observations of the Kami War

card.name: Kami of Ancient Law
card.property: Sacrifice Kami of Ancient Law: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Duty and law are the foundation on which civilization stands. They must not fall, for when they do, they take everything with them." —Lord Konda

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There was a wall here. Now it is dust. A tower rose here. Now it is fallen. An army fought here. Now it is dead. A spirit was here. It is all that remains." —Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

card.name: Kami of the Painted Road
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Kami of the Painted Road gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In ancient times, precepts of kami law were inscribed onto bridges as a gesture of respect. During the war, humans regarded them as warnings of where not to travel.

card.name: Kami of the Palace Fields
card.property: Flying, first strike Soulshift 5 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Kitsune Blademaster
card.property: First strike Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those kitsune trained in the blade preferred to fight with a blade-catching jitte in the off hand, buying them just enough time to deliver the first deadly cut.

card.name: Kitsune Diviner
card.property: {T}: Tap target Spirit.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She who once led prayers honoring the kami adapted to use her influence to stay them.

card.name: Kitsune Healer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target legendary creature this turn.

card.name: Kitsune Mystic
card.property: At the beginning of the end step, if Kitsune Mystic is enchanted by two or more Auras, flip it.

alternate.name: Autumn-Tail, Kitsune Sage
alternate.property: {1}: Attach target Aura attached to a creature to another creature.

card.name: Kitsune Riftwalker
card.property: Protection from Spirits and from Arcane

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wake of his passage shoved aside the influence of the kami.

card.name: Konda, Lord of Eiganjo
card.property: Vigilance, indestructible Bushido 5 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +5/+5 until end of turn.)

card.name: Konda's Hatamoto
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) As long as you control a legendary Samurai, Konda's Hatamoto gets +1/+2 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

card.name: Lantern Kami
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Snuffing the light of a lantern without saying a small prayer is bad luck. Though its flame can only singe, its soul can repeatedly visit misery on one's house." —Teachings of Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

card.name: Masako the Humorless
card.property: Flash Tapped creatures you control can block as though they were untapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Konda's servants dared not neglect their duties for a moment under Masako's icy gaze, knowing that what she saw, Lord Konda would hear.

card.name: Mothrider Samurai
card.property: Flying Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the night blossoms open, the wings of Eiganjo take flight.

card.name: Myojin of Cleansing Fire
card.property: Myojin of Cleansing Fire enters the battlefield with a divinity counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Myojin of Cleansing Fire has indestructible as long as it has a divinity counter on it. Remove a divinity counter from Myojin of Cleansing Fire: Destroy all other creatures.

card.name: Nagao, Bound by Honor
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Nagao, Bound by Honor attacks, Samurai creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Otherworldly Journey
card.property: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The landscape shimmered and I felt a chill breeze. When my vision cleared, I found myself alone among the corpses of my fallen friends." —Journal found in Numai

card.name: Pious Kitsune
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a devotion counter on Pious Kitsune. Then if a creature named Eight-and-a-Half-Tails is on the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each devotion counter on Pious Kitsune. {T}, Remove a devotion counter from Pious Kitsune: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Quiet Purity
card.property: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the Kami of Utter Silence passes, walls lose their secrets. Scrolls lose their lessons. Tapestries lose their beauty. Where there was meaning, there is only stillness." —Sensei Hisoka

card.name: Reciprocate
card.property: Exile target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just as the noble soul calls virtue to itself, the evil soul summons harm." —Teachings of Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

card.name: Reverse the Sands
card.property: Redistribute any number of players' life totals. (Each of those players gets one life total back.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Worse than the years of aging was the burden of memory. The young monk lost his youth and gained a vicarious lifetime of hardship and woe.

card.name: Samurai Enforcers
card.property: Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the moment they swore their oaths, they belonged to their lord, sword and soul.

card.name: Samurai of the Pale Curtain
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) If a permanent would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Sensei Golden-Tail
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {1}{W}, {T}: Put a training counter on target creature. That creature gains bushido 1 and becomes a Samurai in addition to its other creature types. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Silent-Chant Zubera
card.property: When Silent-Chant Zubera dies, you gain 2 life for each Zubera that died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Honden of Cleansing Fire was abandoned, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to erode mortal will.

card.name: Takeno, Samurai General
card.property: Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.) Each other Samurai creature you control gets +1/+1 for each point of bushido it has.

card.name: Terashi's Cry
card.property: Tap up to three target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sun kami is terrible to behold. When its temper flares, best seek shade and pray for forgiveness." —Sensei Golden-Tail

card.name: Vassal's Duty
card.property: {1}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target legendary creature you control this turn is dealt to you instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My life is yours, my lord. There is no greater service than to yield it for your safety."

card.name: Vigilance
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Put a spear in a peasant's hands, and you have an expendable troop. Put a purpose in his heart, and you win a warrior." —Sensei Golden-Tail

card.name: Yosei, the Morning Star
card.property: Flying When Yosei, the Morning Star dies, target player skips their next untap step. Tap up to five target permanents that player controls.

card.name: Aura of Dominion
card.property: Enchant creature {1}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Untap enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lies and deceit do yield results, but legitimate authority is the ultimate form of control." —Meloku the Clouded Mirror

card.name: Azami, Lady of Scrolls
card.property: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Choices belong to those with the luxuries of time and distance. We have neither. I recommend we proceed with the plan to destroy all shrines of the kami." —Lady Azami, letter to Sensei Hisoka

card.name: Callous Deceiver
card.property: {1}: Look at the top card of your library. {2}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, Callous Deceiver gets +1/+0 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Consuming Vortex
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Splice onto Arcane {3}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Counsel of the Soratami
card.property: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wisdom is not the counting of all the drops in a waterfall. Wisdom is learning why the water seeks the earth."

card.name: Cut the Tethers
card.property: For each Spirit, return it to its owner's hand unless that player pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You cannot bar the path of gods. You can only divert their journey for a while." —Sensei Hisoka

card.name: Dampen Thought
card.property: Target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Eerie Procession
card.property: Search your library for an Arcane card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though in years past speculation was not encouraged about the strange ways of kami, now we must understand their motivations, if such is even possible to the mortal mind." —Lady Azami

card.name: Eye of Nowhere
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once we prayed to the kaijin for safe voyage. Now we only pray that we can escape their gaze." —Hayato, master sailor

card.name: Field of Reality
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked by Spirits. {1}{U}: Return Field of Reality to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The scholars of the Minamo School understood the veil between their world and that of the kami. Moreover, they knew how to exploit it." —Observations of the Kami War

card.name: Floating-Dream Zubera
card.property: When Floating-Dream Zubera dies, draw a card for each Zubera that died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Honden of Seeing Winds was forgotten, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to uncover mortal secrets.

card.name: Gifts Ungiven
card.property: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Graceful Adept
card.property: You have no maximum hand size.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you have mastered my lessons, it will seem as though the whole of the world has opened up to your mind and nothing is beyond your grasp." —Lady Azami

card.name: Guardian of Solitude
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It seemed an easy thing, to step into the nothingness, to fall, to die. But then, for an instant, I saw it, eyes filled with endless sorrow, and I turned back to face my pain." —Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

card.name: Hinder
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put that card on the top or bottom of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not react to force in kind. Turn it aside. Direct it to where it can do no harm." —Meloku the Clouded Mirror

card.name: Hisoka, Minamo Sensei
card.property: {2} {U}, Discard a card: Counter target spell if it has the same converted mana cost as the discarded card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By all rights we should have perished in the Kami War. Our perseverence is a tribute to mortal ingenuity. And perhaps a few forgotten secrets found in the nick of time."

card.name: Hisoka's Defiance
card.property: Counter target Spirit or Arcane spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With every passing day, the kami shape our world to suit their will. I, for one, would not see them succeed."

card.name: Hisoka's Guard
card.property: You may choose not to untap Hisoka's Guard during your untap step. {1}{U}, {T}: Target creature you control other than Hisoka's Guard has shroud for as long as Hisoka's Guard remains tapped. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Honden of Seeing Winds
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card for each Shrine you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the sorrow of all, its winds found sin in the hearts of those who once learned from its wisdom.

card.name: Jushi Apprentice
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}: Draw a card. If you have nine or more cards in hand, flip Jushi Apprentice.

alternate.name: Tomoya the Revealer

card.name: Kami of Twisted Reflection
card.property: Sacrifice Kami of Twisted Reflection: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its form reflected humanity as it stood during the Kami War: disjointed, confused, and incomplete.

card.name: Keiga, the Tide Star
card.property: Flying When Keiga, the Tide Star dies, gain control of target creature.

card.name: Lifted by Clouds
card.property: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Meloku the Clouded Mirror
card.property: Flying {1}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Create a 1/1 blue Illusion creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He loved his cities in the clouds. When he traveled to the lands below, he brought many reminders of his home.

card.name: Myojin of Seeing Winds
card.property: Myojin of Seeing Winds enters the battlefield with a divinity counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Myojin of Seeing Winds has indestructible as long as it has a divinity counter on it. Remove a divinity counter from Myojin of Seeing Winds: Draw a card for each permanent you control.

card.name: Mystic Restraints
card.property: Flash Enchant creature When Mystic Restraints enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Part the Veil
card.property: Return all creatures you control to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the waterfall, the border between the humanoid and the spirit worlds was weakest. The kami moved across it with ease and at will.

card.name: Peer Through Depths
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Petals of Insight
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order. If you do, return Petals of Insight to its owner's hand. Otherwise, draw three cards.

card.name: Psychic Puppetry
card.property: You may tap or untap target permanent. Splice onto Arcane {U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Reach Through Mists
card.property: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Know one part of the name, obsession begins. Know two parts, paranoia sets in. Know three parts, madness descends. Know all, and only the kami know what will become of you." —Lady Azami

card.name: Reweave
card.property: Target permanent's controller sacrifices it. If the player does, they reveal cards from the top of their library until they reveal a permanent card that shares a card type with the sacrificed permanent, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library. Splice onto Arcane {2}{U}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Since the war began, fishermen don't sing to the kaijin to ask for full nets. They guard the shore with thrice-blessed spears, saving the nets for their wives to pack their belongings and leave." —Hayato, master sailor

card.name: Sift Through Sands
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard a card. If you've cast a spell named Peer Through Depths and a spell named Reach Through Mists this turn, you may search your library for a card named The Unspeakable, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Sire of the Storm
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This storm blows gales through the dreams of men.

card.name: Soratami Cloudskater
card.property: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You hide your actions from eyes on the ground, but nothing escapes the clouds."

card.name: Soratami Mirror-Guard
card.property: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Soratami Mirror-Mage
card.property: Flying {3}, Return three lands you control to their owner's hand: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The clouds obey my whims, and you'll obey theirs."

card.name: Soratami Rainshaper
card.property: Flying {3}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature you control gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Soratami Savant
card.property: Flying {3}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Soratami Seer
card.property: Flying {4}, Return two lands you control to their owner's hand: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their mirrors show two worlds: that which is and that which should be.

card.name: Squelch
card.property: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oku-Doku had gone through all the motions: the same akki cursewords, the same ingredients with their horrid stink, the same rude gestures. Yet not a person died.

card.name: Student of Elements
card.property: When Student of Elements has flying, flip it.

card.name: Swirl the Mists
card.property: As Swirl the Mists enters the battlefield, choose a color word. All instances of color words in the text of spells and permanents are changed to the chosen color word.

card.name: Teller of Tales
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Words never uttered by mortals flowed incessantly from its many mouths.

card.name: Thoughtbind
card.property: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the rest of the mortal world waged war, Lady Azami and her students invaded tomes of knowledge. Their search yielded spells critical in the fight." —Observations of the Kami War

card.name: Time Stop
card.property: End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities on the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

card.name: The Unspeakable
card.property: Flying, trample Whenever The Unspeakable deals combat damage to a player, you may return target Arcane card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is madness that drives men to seek forbidden knowledge, and madness has given it form.

card.name: Uyo, Silent Prophet
card.property: Flying {2}, Return two lands you control to their owner's hand: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I saw them once, when I was a child. They led me to my parents' arms when I was lost. Why have they abandoned me now? Why won't they take me home again?"—Unnamed beggar

card.name: Ashen-Skin Zubera
card.property: When Ashen-Skin Zubera dies, target opponent discards a card for each Zubera that died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Honden of Night's Reach began to crumble, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to haunt mortal dreams.

card.name: Befoul
card.property: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the rampaging kami at Reito had crushed the opposing militia, swarms of minor kami swept over the battlefield to consume all that remained." —Great Battles of Kamigawa

card.name: Blood Speaker
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Blood Speaker. If you do, search your library for a Demon card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Whenever a Demon enters the battlefield under your control, return Blood Speaker from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Bloodthirsty Ogre
card.property: {T}: Put a devotion counter on Bloodthirsty Ogre. {T}: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of devotion counters on Bloodthirsty Ogre. Activate this ability only if you control a Demon.

card.name: Cranial Extraction
card.property: Choose a nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Cruel Deceiver
card.property: {1}: Look at the top card of your library. {2}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, Cruel Deceiver gains "Whenever Cruel Deceiver deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature" until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Cursed Ronin
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {B}: Cursed Ronin gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are fortunate, my enemy. You have paid the price but once. I never stop paying."

card.name: Dance of Shadows
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only one man survived, barely sane. He got out two words before collapsing: shadows' shadows."

card.name: Deathcurse Ogre
card.property: When Deathcurse Ogre dies, each player loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After their worship of oni began, only a few of Kamigawa's ogres remained in the bitter cold of the Tendo Peaks. Most were drawn to the darkness of Takenuma.

card.name: Devouring Greed
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of Spirits. Target player loses 2 life plus 2 life for each Spirit sacrificed this way. You gain that much life.

card.name: Distress
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Today I asked Master Dosan what the ogre mages did with the humans they sacrificed. He gave me a hard look and said to think no more on the matter." —Meditation journal of young budoka

card.name: Gibbering Kami
card.property: Flying Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Gutwrencher Oni
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, discard a card if you don't control an Ogre.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blood drips. Blood sings. Blood devours all and only blood remains." —Ogre chant

card.name: He Who Hungers
card.property: Flying {1}, Sacrifice a Spirit: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Hideous Laughter
card.property: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Splice onto Arcane {3}{B}{B} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Honden of Night's Reach
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent discards a card for each Shrine you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the sorrow of all, its dark reach grasped and crushed those who guarded its silent vigil.

card.name: Horobi, Death's Wail
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the ashes of Reito rose a new kami. And thereafter at every battle came Horobi, Death's Wail." —The History of Kamigawa

card.name: Iname, Death Aspect
card.property: When Iname, Death Aspect enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of Spirit cards and put them into your graveyard. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Iname revels in sadistic glee at the crushing of souls, but soon mourns the lives so cruelly cut short. So the cycle begins anew.

card.name: Kami of Lunacy
card.property: Flying Soulshift 5 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Kami of the Waning Moon
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For a moment, Reito's defenders regrouped. Then wailing kami reappeared to send them scattering like flocks of frightened birds."—Great Battles of Kamigawa

card.name: Kiku, Night's Flower

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A wanderer has told me of an assassin in the Takenuma Swamp who uses her dark arts to animate her enemies' shadows against them. A wild tale, but it explains much." —Diary of Azusa

card.name: Kokusho, the Evening Star
card.property: Flying When Kokusho, the Evening Star dies, each opponent loses 5 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Kuro, Pitlord
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Kuro, Pitlord unless you pay {B}{B}{B}{B}. Pay 1 life: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Marrow-Gnawer
card.property: All Rats have fear. {T}, Sacrifice a Rat: Create X 1/1 black Rat creature tokens, where X is the number of Rats you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Marrow-Gnawer united three nezumi gangs when he slew their leaders in a single night. Now they call him their first lord.

card.name: Midnight Covenant
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not all mortals fought the kami. The ogres revered the oni, while some humans made pacts based upon empty promises." —The History of Kamigawa

card.name: Myojin of Night's Reach
card.property: Myojin of Night's Reach enters the battlefield with a divinity counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Myojin of Night's Reach has indestructible as long as it has a divinity counter on it. Remove a divinity counter from Myojin of Night's Reach: Each opponent discards their hand.

card.name: Nezumi Bone-Reader
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Four generations ago, old Split-Tail stole a bundle of scrolls from the Minamo School. Soon after, the first nezumi shamans were born.

card.name: Nezumi Cutthroat
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Nezumi Cutthroat can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These nezumi, they disgust me. The things they will do for money no other thinking creature would consider. This, of course, makes them useful beyond words." —Meloku the Clouded Mirror

card.name: Nezumi Graverobber
card.property: {1} {B}: Exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If no cards are in that graveyard, flip Nezumi Graverobber.

alternate.name: Nighteyes the Desecrator
alternate.property: {4} {B}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Nezumi Ronin
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some nezumi became as skilled in the samurai arts as the humans and kitsune. Yet no lord would have them, so they sold their swords to the highest bidder." —The History of Kamigawa

card.name: Nezumi Shortfang
card.property: {1} {B}, {T}: Target opponent discards a card. Then if that player has no cards in hand, flip Nezumi Shortfang.

alternate.name: Stabwhisker the Odious
alternate.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player loses 1 life for each card fewer than three in their hand.

card.name: Night Dealings
card.property: Whenever a source you control deals damage to another player, put that many theft counters on Night Dealings. {2}{B}{B}, Remove X theft counters from Night Dealings: Search your library for a nonland card with converted mana cost X, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Night of Souls' Betrayal
card.property: All creatures get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can we wage war against ourselves? What happens when the kami of our very souls rise against us? I answer simply: We cannot. We die. There can be no victory in this war."—Sensei Hisoka, letter to Lord Konda

card.name: Numai Outcast
card.property: Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.) {B}, Pay 5 life: Regenerate Numai Outcast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beware the blade of dishonor. It kills more silently than war, more quickly than age." —Sensei Golden-Tail

card.name: Oni Possession
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample. Enchanted creature is a Demon Spirit.

card.name: Painwracker Oni
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature if you don't control an Ogre.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blood flows. Blood calls. Blood devours all and only blood remains." —Ogre chant

card.name: Pull Under
card.property: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Although nowhere on Kamigawa was safe during the war, the Takenuma Swamp was the most horrifying. The rotting bamboo itself rebelled against its mortal inhabitants, pulling them into unmarked graves." —Observations of the Kami War

card.name: Rag Dealer
card.property: {2} {B}, {T}: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After General Takeno found the Oathkeeper amidst the bamboo marshes, more scavengers braved the swamp's nezumi, oni, and kami in hopes of glory." —The History of Kamigawa

card.name: Ragged Veins
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, its controller loses that much life.

card.name: Rend Flesh
card.property: Destroy target non-Spirit creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Reito Massacre was a testament to the kami's unstoppable power. The human defenders might as well have been moths battling a forest fire." —Great Battles of Kamigawa

card.name: Rend Spirit
card.property: Destroy target Spirit.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The battle at Ganzan Pass was a testament to human endurance. The untrained and frightened group escaped three legions of kami, leaving more than their share of slain foes in their wake." —Great Battles of Kamigawa

card.name: Scuttling Death
card.property: Sacrifice Scuttling Death: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Seizan, Perverter of Truth
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 2 life and draws two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you would taste the wisdom of the oni, be prepared to salt it with your blood."—Kiku, Night's Flower

card.name: Soulless Revival
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Splice onto Arcane {1}{B} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Struggle for Sanity
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. That player exiles a card from it, then you exile a card from it. Repeat this process until all cards in that hand have been exiled. That player returns the cards they exiled this way to their hand and puts the rest into their graveyard.

card.name: Swallowing Plague
card.property: Swallowing Plague deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are recalling all forces from the Takenuma Swamp. We lose men daily to kami attacks, and it seems our defeats only encourage them further." —General Takeno, letter to Lord Konda

card.name: Thief of Hope
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Soulshift 2 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Villainous Ogre
card.property: Villainous Ogre can't block. As long as you control a Demon, Villainous Ogre has "{B}: Regenerate Villainous Ogre."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The war saw the ogres emerge from their caves, reeking of blood, with the power of oni in their veins." —Observations of the Kami War

card.name: Waking Nightmare
card.property: Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once each year, the oni and other evil spirits paraded through villages to disturb mortals' sleep. During the war, this parade became a nightly event." —Observations of the Kami War

card.name: Wicked Akuba
card.property: {B}: Target player dealt damage by Wicked Akuba this turn loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sound of children weeping is a song that fills its heart with joy.

card.name: Akki Avalanchers
card.property: Sacrifice a land: Akki Avalanchers gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Among Godo's hordes, "beware of falling rocks" came to mean "akki live nearby."

card.name: Akki Coalflinger
card.property: First strike {R}, {T}: Attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No matter where you find them, goblins love rocks.

card.name: Akki Lavarunner
card.property: Haste Whenever Akki Lavarunner deals damage to an opponent, flip it.

alternate.name: Tok-Tok, Volcano Born
alternate.property: Protection from red If a red source would deal damage to a player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that player instead.

card.name: Akki Rockspeaker
card.property: When Akki Rockspeaker enters the battlefield, add {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lava-proof shells of akki evolved over centuries, as akki pranks almost always got seriously out of hand.

card.name: Akki Underminer
card.property: Whenever Akki Underminer deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Deep inside the Sokenzan Mountains, a band of akki discovered a cache of ancient items of power. Their ensuing spree of destruction became known as 'The Three Days of Fun.'" —Observations of the Kami War

card.name: Battle-Mad Ronin
card.property: Bushido 2 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.) Battle-Mad Ronin attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fought fiercely, bravely, and without mercy. Had I not struck down my captain in the heat of battle, I might have become a hero instead of an outcast."

card.name: Ben-Ben, Akki Hermit
card.property: {T}: Ben-Ben, Akki Hermit deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of untapped Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some akki thought of Ben-Ben as a kami of trickery in disguise. They hunted for him in the maze of warrens, often falling prey to his traps.

card.name: Blind with Anger
card.property: Untap target nonlegendary creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can post only the most honorable and strong-willed samurai to defend your stronghold. I have seen what can happen to lesser men." —General Takeno, letter to Lord Konda

card.name: Blood Rites
card.property: {1} {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Blood Rites deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The threat of the kami was made worse by the blood rituals of the ogres, who freed terrifying oni to wander Kamigawa unhindered." —Observations of the Kami War

card.name: Brothers Yamazaki
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) If there are exactly two permanents named Brothers Yamazaki on the battlefield, the "legend rule" doesn't apply to them. Each other creature named Brothers Yamazaki gets +2/+2 and has haste.

card.name: Brothers Yamazaki
card.property: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) If there are exactly two permanents named Brothers Yamazaki on the battlefield, the "legend rule" doesn't apply to them. Each other creature named Brothers Yamazaki gets +2/+2 and has haste.

card.name: Brutal Deceiver
card.property: {1}: Look at the top card of your library. {2}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, Brutal Deceiver gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Crushing Pain
card.property: Crushing Pain deals 6 damage to target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is said that the mere touch of a kami is like embracing the sun itself.

card.name: Desperate Ritual
card.property: Add {R}{R}{R}. Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Devouring Rage
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of Spirits. Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. For each Spirit sacrificed this way, that creature gets an additional +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Earthshaker
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Earthshaker deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It scaled the Sokenzan Mountains in search of Kumano's secret. The mountain shook for two days, and the kami never returned.

card.name: Ember-Fist Zubera
card.property: When Ember-Fist Zubera dies, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of Zubera that died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Honden of Infinite Rage shattered, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to sow mortal destruction.

card.name: Frostwielder
card.property: If a creature dealt damage by Frostwielder this turn would die, exile it instead. {T}: Frostwielder deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Glacial Ray
card.property: Glacial Ray deals 2 damage to any target. Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Godo, Bandit Warlord
card.property: When Godo, Bandit Warlord enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library. Whenever Godo attacks for the first time each turn, untap it and all Samurai you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Hanabi Blast
card.property: Hanabi Blast deals 2 damage to any target. Return Hanabi Blast to its owner's hand, then discard a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most powerful of akki fire spells were developed at the cost of blood, toil, tears, sweat, and usually a nose or two.

card.name: Hearth Kami
card.property: {X}, Sacrifice Hearth Kami: Destroy target artifact with converted mana cost X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every treachery, great or small, begets a spirit that rages at the injustice. Given the opportunity, each will return that treachery to its owner tenfold." —Sensei Hisoka

card.name: Honden of Infinite Rage
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Honden of Infinite Rage deals damage to any target equal to the number of Shrines you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the sorrow of all, its rage became focused on those who once stoked it.

card.name: Initiate of Blood
card.property: {T}: Initiate of Blood deals 1 damage to target creature that was dealt damage this turn. When that creature dies this turn, flip Initiate of Blood.

alternate.name: Goka the Unjust
alternate.property: {T}: Goka the Unjust deals 4 damage to target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Kami of Fire's Roar
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can hear the shamans chanting in the hills. They say their magic will protect us from the kami, that our gold has bought our safety. But no one sleeps soundly tonight." —Scroll fragment from the ruins of Reito

card.name: Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
card.property: Haste {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Kumano, Master Yamabushi
Kumano's Pupils
card.property: If a creature dealt damage by Kumano's Pupils this turn would die, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Long before he reluctantly joined the war, stories spread of Kumano's followers winning victories against the kami." —Observations of the Kami War

card.name: Lava Spike
card.property: Lava Spike deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some kami attacks during the war were rife with trickery, subterfuge, and subtlety, draining hope and pride from the mortal world. Other attacks were a lot more straightforward.

card.name: Mana Seism
card.property: Sacrifice any number of lands, then add that much {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the nature of humanity not to worry about tomorrow, especially when there's a good chance they won't live to see the end of today." —Kiku, Night's Flower

card.name: Mindblaze
card.property: Choose a nonland card name and a number greater than 0. Target player reveals their library. If that library contains exactly the chosen number of cards with the chosen name, Mindblaze deals 8 damage to that player. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Myojin of Infinite Rage
card.property: Myojin of Infinite Rage enters the battlefield with a divinity counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Myojin of Infinite Rage has indestructible as long as it has a divinity counter on it. Remove a divinity counter from Myojin of Infinite Rage: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Ore Gorger
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've stumbled upon a network of caves not on our maps. We can only hope it is safe to spend the night." —Lost Battalion, message to General Takeno

card.name: Pain Kami
card.property: {X} {R}, Sacrifice Pain Kami: It deals X damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All kami are our enemies now, A very tough lesson to learn. But it's one that's taken quickly, When you feel what it's like to burn" —Ku-Ku, akki poet

card.name: Ronin Houndmaster
card.property: Haste Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some samurai fell so far out of grace that only dogs would keep them company.

card.name: Ryusei, the Falling Star
card.property: Flying When Ryusei, the Falling Star dies, it deals 5 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Shimatsu the Bloodcloaked
card.property: As Shimatsu the Bloodcloaked enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of permanents. Shimatsu enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their dominion over dark and destructive forces twisted the oni into beings of pure malevolence.

card.name: Sideswipe
card.property: You may change any targets of target Arcane spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hisoka's wizards struggled for years to master the art of redirection that came so naturally to the shamans of Ganzan Pass.

card.name: Sokenzan Bruiser
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We camped near the Sokenzan Mountains. Though I know its inhabitants are sparse, I hear cries coming from the highest peaks every night, as if the mountains themselves bellow for vengeance." —Lost Battalion, message to General Takeno

card.name: Soul of Magma
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Soul of Magma deals 1 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In every other mind, the battle was lost. General Takeno alone was not touched by despair. Drawing his blade, he was attack and rallying cry in one." —Battle of Akagi River: A Survivor's Tale

card.name: Soulblast
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice all creatures you control. Soulblast deals damage to any target equal to the total power of the sacrificed creatures.

card.name: Stone Rain
card.property: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The kami struck with gouts of fire, showers of rock, and the combined rage of the spirit world. Only Eiganjo Castle remained standing, glistening untouched in the sun." —The History of Kamigawa

card.name: Strange Inversion
card.property: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Through the Breach
card.property: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step. Splice onto Arcane {2}{R}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Tide of War
card.property: Whenever one or more creatures block, flip a coin. If you win the flip, each blocking creature is sacrificed by its controller. If you lose the flip, each blocked creature is sacrificed by its controller.

card.name: Uncontrollable Anger
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To an akki warrior, gravity is the direction of the nearest unsmashed face.

card.name: Unearthly Blizzard
card.property: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are trapped. The mountains and blinding kami storms have made us hopelessly lost. We are starving. In the name of all things sacred, please, send help . . . ." —Lost Battalion, final message to General Takeno

card.name: Unnatural Speed
card.property: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can we hope to match the speed of lightning? The fury of storms? The power of mountains? The answer is simple. We cannot. I advise against this war." —Sensei Hisoka, letter to Lord Konda

card.name: Yamabushi's Flame
card.property: Yamabushi's Flame deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Yamabushi's Storm
card.property: Yamabushi's Storm deals 1 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Zo-Zu the Punisher
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, Zo-Zu the Punisher deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He can cause a lot of pain and do it with no fuss. That's all good, but I just wish he didn't do it to us" —Ku-Ku, akki poet

card.name: Azusa, Lost but Seeking
card.property: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."

card.name: Budoka Gardener
card.property: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you control ten or more lands, flip Budoka Gardener.

alternate.name: Dokai, Weaver of Life

card.name: Burr Grafter
card.property: Sacrifice Burr Grafter: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Commune with Nature
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Dosan the Falling Leaf
card.property: Players can cast spells only during their own turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each night as Master Dosan prays to the kami, the hate he receives in return withers his body a little more. Though the kami are slowly killing him, still he continues his prayers."—Meditation journal of a young budoka

card.name: Dripping-Tongue Zubera
card.property: When Dripping-Tongue Zubera dies, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token for each Zubera that died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Honden of Life's Web was destroyed, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to ensure mortal defeat.

card.name: Feast of Worms
card.property: Destroy target land. If that land was legendary, its controller sacrifices another land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dust beneath our feet was once part of a mighty civilization. Shall we too provide the path for a future generation?" —Sensei Golden-Tail

card.name: Feral Deceiver
card.property: {1}: Look at the top card of your library. {2}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, Feral Deceiver gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Gale Force
card.property: Gale Force deals 5 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everything the kami had done, they did with more force. Gentle breezes became typhoons, rolling rivers turned to crushing rapids, and gentle growth became overnight masses of thorns and vines.

card.name: Glimpse of Nature
card.property: Whenever you cast a creature spell this turn, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dosan sat in repose for many hours. He made no motion, no sound at all. And as he sat, nature revealed itself to him.

card.name: Hana Kami
card.property: {1} {G}, Sacrifice Hana Kami: Return target Arcane card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It grew in lands lit by pride and watered by tears.

card.name: Heartbeat of Spring
card.property: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is true that we monks hold the key to paradise, but most don't understand that the paradise we guard is the one within." —Diary of Azusa

card.name: Honden of Life's Web
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token for each Shrine you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the sorrow of all, its web became a net that strangled those who helped weave it.

card.name: Humble Budoka
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each time wanderers entered the forest seeking enlightenment, Dosan was there, waiting for them to arrive.

card.name: Iname, Life Aspect
card.property: When Iname, Life Aspect dies, you may exile it. If you do, return any number of target Spirit cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Iname rejoices in the dawn of a new life, but soon becomes jealous of the simple joys denied him by his station. So the cycle begins anew.

card.name: Joyous Respite
card.property: You gain 1 life for each land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have been gifted by the kami with long life. So far, they have not seen fit to withdraw their gift. There may yet be a way to stop the killing without more blood, human or kami, being spilled." —Dosan the Falling Leaf

card.name: Jugan, the Rising Star
card.property: Flying When Jugan, the Rising Star dies, you may distribute five +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures.

card.name: Jukai Messenger
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dosan's monks, deep in spiritual thought, could walk through the thickest of forests without leaving a mark, even the leaves beneath their feet unaffected by their passing.

card.name: Kami of the Hunt
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Kami of the Hunt gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry, Jiro. The kami would never attack us this close to home . . . . Jiro?" —Hoto, temple guardian, last words

card.name: Kashi-Tribe Reaver
card.property: Whenever Kashi-Tribe Reaver deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. {1}{G}: Regenerate Kashi-Tribe Reaver.

card.name: Kashi-Tribe Warriors
card.property: Whenever Kashi-Tribe Warriors deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The orochi and the monks had always had an unspoken agreement: live and let live. But when the kami began raging, some warrior youths began questioning that agreement.

card.name: Kodama of the North Tree
card.property: Trample Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The monks of the North Tree rarely saw their kodama until the Kami War, when it woke like a slumbering, angry bear." —"Poem of the Five Trees"

card.name: Kodama of the South Tree
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, each other creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The monks of the South Tree had always reveled beneath their kodama's friendly gaze. During the Kami War, this gaze became fierce and full of hate." —"Poem of the Five Trees"

card.name: Kodama's Might
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Splice onto Arcane {G} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Kodama's Reach
card.property: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land grows only where the kami will it." —Dosan the Falling Leaf

card.name: Lure
card.property: Enchant creature All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jukai Forest was known for its secrets, which drew in many wayfarers and wizards. But it was those same secrets that kept most of those seekers from ever being heard from again.

card.name: Matsu-Tribe Decoy
Moss Kami
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kami manifest in the form of whatever they embody in the physical plane. Some tower in the shape of moss or bark, while others take forms beyond mortal imagining.

card.name: Myojin of Life's Web
card.property: Myojin of Life's Web enters the battlefield with a divinity counter on it if you cast it from your hand. Myojin of Life's Web has indestructible as long as it has a divinity counter on it. Remove a divinity counter from Myojin of Life's Web: Put any number of creature cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Nature's Will
card.property: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Without the kami to speak to nature on our behalf, we must beg help from nature directly." —Seshiro the Anointed

card.name: Orbweaver Kumo
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Orbweaver Kumo gains forestwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our bodies are weak compared to those of the kami, our knowledge limited, and our magic poor. Yet we draw breath. That alone is reason to hope."

card.name: Orochi Eggwatcher
card.property: {2} {G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token. If you control ten or more creatures, flip Orochi Eggwatcher.

alternate.name: Shidako, Broodmistress
alternate.property: {G}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Orochi Leafcaller
card.property: {G}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only orochi hatched from eggs 'touched by the kami' may become shamans. These days, there are fewer and fewer new shamans being born."

card.name: Orochi Ranger
card.property: Whenever Orochi Ranger deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The young come to me, confused. They have been taught to respect the kami, and now they must fight them? I do not know what to say." —Sachi, to her father

card.name: Orochi Sustainer
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing is the same anymore. The forests are not as lush, the waters not as pure, the air not as clear. Without the kami to direct and sustain the forces of nature, it's only a matter of time before we feel their neglect."

card.name: Rootrunner
Sachi, Daughter of Seshiro
card.property: Other Snake creatures you control get +0/+1. Shamans you control have "{T}: Add {G}{G}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The warriors deal in poison and fangs. We shamans remember why our ancestors crawled with their bellies to the earth."

card.name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
card.property: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There were no tombstones in orochi territory. Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

card.name: Serpent Skin
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: Seshiro the Anointed
card.property: Other Snake creatures you control get +2/+2. Whenever a Snake you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His family was the first to reach out to the human monks. He soon knew as many koans as he did blade strikes.

card.name: Shisato, Whispering Hunter
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a Snake. Whenever Shisato, Whispering Hunter deals combat damage to a player, that player skips their next untap step.

card.name: Soilshaper
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target land becomes a 3/3 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It spoke with the voice of nature, but its words were curses spat upon humankind.

card.name: Sosuke, Son of Seshiro
card.property: Other Snake creatures you control get +1/+0. Whenever a Warrior you control deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Strength of Cedars
card.property: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No sooner had the beast collapsed under the blows of Takeno's sword than the earth rippled and the creature rose again to face him." —Battle of Akagi River: A Survivor's Tale

card.name: Thousand-legged Kami
card.property: Soulshift 7 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 7 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Time of Need
card.property: Search your library for a legendary creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the kumo attacked the monks' sacred shrine, a mournful toll for help echoed through the forest. Thus began the Battle of Silk, which would last six years." —Great Battles of Kamigawa

card.name: Venerable Kumo
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Vine Kami
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Soulshift 6 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 6 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Wear Away
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Splice onto Arcane {3}{G} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: General's Kabuto
card.property: Equipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to equipped creature. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Hair-Strung Koto
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Kami War drove many members of Konda's court insane. As their spiritual world turned against them, so too did their minds turn from reality." —The History of Kamigawa

card.name: Hankyu
card.property: Equipped creature has "{T}: Put an aim counter on Hankyu" and "{T}, Remove all aim counters from Hankyu: This creature deals damage to any target equal to the number of aim counters removed this way." Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Honor-Worn Shaku
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. Tap an untapped legendary permanent you control: Untap Honor-Worn Shaku.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before being presented to its lord, each shaku is blessed by every hero of every region within that lord's domain.

card.name: Imi Statue
card.property: Players can't untap more than one artifact during their untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just looking at it fills me with dread . . . . Yet since it arrived, I've done little else. My blades have dulled and my business has failed, and still I cannot look away." —Keisaku, master swordmaker

card.name: Jade Idol
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Jade Idol becomes a 4/4 Spirit artifact creature until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before the Kami War, the shishi were symbolic guardians, protecting the shrines where they stood. But after the kami turned on the material world, shishi began pouncing from their perches to attack would-be supplicants.

card.name: Journeyer's Kite
card.property: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the clouds, you can see as far as the distant horizon. It's a reminder of the infinite possibilities of everyday life." —Noboru, master kitemaker

card.name: Junkyo Bell
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have target creature you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control. If you do, sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Konda's Banner
card.property: Konda's Banner can be attached only to a legendary creature. Creatures that share a color with equipped creature get +1/+1. Creatures that share a creature type with equipped creature get +1/+1. Equip {2}

card.name: Kusari-Gama
card.property: Equipped creature has "{2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn." Whenever equipped creature deals damage to a blocking creature, Kusari-Gama deals that much damage to each other creature defending player controls. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Long-Forgotten Gohei
card.property: Arcane spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Spirit creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long ago, the priests would wave the gohei to call down the gods. Now it lies forgotten, but the spirits still feel its pull.

card.name: Moonring Mirror
card.property: Whenever you draw a card, exile the top card of your library face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile all cards from your hand face down. If you do, put all other cards you own exiled with Moonring Mirror into your hand.

card.name: Nine-Ringed Bo
card.property: {T}: Nine-Ringed Bo deals 1 damage to target Spirit creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We received an anonymous letter suggesting that Kumano holds a secret to defeating the kami, but he is nowhere to be found." —General Takeno, letter to Lord Konda

card.name: No-Dachi
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not keen-edged enough for cutting armor, the no-dachi slew by folding its victim rapidly and violently under the weight of its impact.

card.name: Oathkeeper, Takeno's Daisho
card.property: Equipped creature gets +3/+1. Whenever equipped creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control if it's a Samurai card. When Oathkeeper, Takeno's Daisho is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, exile equipped creature. Equip {2}

card.name: Orochi Hatchery
card.property: Orochi Hatchery enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. {5}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token for each charge counter on Orochi Hatchery.

card.name: Reito Lantern
card.property: {3}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lanterns carved from the mystic stones of the Reito Mines were said to light the way of lost souls.

card.name: Sensei's Divining Top
card.property: {1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. {T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Shell of the Last Kappa
card.property: {3}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery spell that targets you. (The spell has no effect.) {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Shell of the Last Kappa: You may cast a card exiled with Shell of the Last Kappa without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Tatsumasa, the Dragon's Fang
Tenza, Godo's Maul
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. As long as it's legendary, it gets an additional +2/+2. As long as it's red, it has trample. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Uba Mask
card.property: If a player would draw a card, that player exiles that card face up instead. Each player may play lands and cast spells from among cards they exiled with Uba Mask this turn.

card.name: Boseiju, Who Shelters All
card.property: Boseiju, Who Shelters All enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Pay 2 life: Add {C}. If that mana is spent on an instant or sorcery spell, that spell can't be countered.

card.name: Cloudcrest Lake
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. Cloudcrest Lake doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Eiganjo Castle
card.property: {T}: Add {W}. {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target legendary creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Since the war began, the castle's walls mark the only place on Kamigawa where no kami has ever set foot.

card.name: Forbidden Orchard
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Whenever you tap Forbidden Orchard for mana, target opponent creates a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

card.name: Hall of the Bandit Lord
card.property: Hall of the Bandit Lord enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Pay 3 life: Add {C}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains haste.

card.name: Lantern-Lit Graveyard
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. Lantern-Lit Graveyard doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Minamo, School at Water's Edge
card.property: {T}: Add {U}. {U}, {T}: Untap target legendary permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its students graduate the school and enter history.

card.name: Okina, Temple to the Grandfathers
card.property: {T}: Add {G}. {G}, {T}: Target legendary creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If a land can be said to have a heart, Okina is the heart of Kamigawa.

card.name: Pinecrest Ridge
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. Pinecrest Ridge doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Shinka, the Bloodsoaked Keep
card.property: {T}: Add {R}. {R}, {T}: Target legendary creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The glow from within looks inviting, but woe awaits whomever finds out who stokes the fire or what simmers in the pot.

card.name: Shizo, Death's Storehouse
card.property: {T}: Add {B}. {B}, {T}: Target legendary creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries ago, Shizo was a verdant field of wildflowers. After 891 samurai died in a single battle on its grasses, it became a haunted moor.

card.name: Tranquil Garden
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. Tranquil Garden doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Untaidake, the Cloud Keeper
card.property: Untaidake, the Cloud Keeper enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Pay 2 life: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast legendary spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Untaidake is the needle that weaves the fabric of creation.

card.name: Waterveil Cavern
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. Waterveil Cavern doesn't untap during your next untap step.
